name: Solo Leveling
desc: Solo Leveling follows the story of Sung Jin-Woo, a weak and unassuming hunter who is given the opportunity to become a 'player' in a mysterious game-like world. As a player, he gains the ability to level up and acquire new skills, but he soon realizes that he is the only one who can see the system and the only one who can level up. Sung Jin-Woo must use his newfound powers to survive in a world where hunters are hunted and monsters roam free.

name: Naruto
desc: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja, dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village. With his friends Sakura and Sasuke, he embarks on a journey to become stronger and protect his village from threats.

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
desc: Yuji Itadori, a high school student, swallows a cursed object to protect his friends, becoming the host of a powerful curse. He joins the Jujutsu Sorcerers to learn how to control his newfound powers and fight against evil forces.

name: Death Note
desc: Light Yagami, a high school student, discovers a notebook that can kill anyone whose name is written in it. He uses it to create a utopian society without crime, but a genius detective named L is determined to catch him.

name: Attack on Titan
desc: In a world where humans are on the brink of extinction, Eren Yeager and his friends Mikasa and Armin join the Scout Regiment to fight against the Titans, giant humanoidcreatures that devour humans.

name: My Hero Academia
desc: Izuku Midoriya, a young boy without any powers, dreams of becoming a superhero. He is chosen by the world's greatest hero, All Might, to inherit his powers and attend U.A. High School, a prestigious school for heroes in training.

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
desc: Tanjiro Kamado, a young boy, becomes a demon slayer after his family is killed by demons and his sister Nezuko is turned into a demon. He embarks on a journey to find a cure for Nezuko and avenge his family.

name: One Piece
desc: Monkey D. Luffy, a young pirate, dreams of becoming the King of the Pirates. He sets out on a journey to find the legendary treasure, One Piece, and forms a crew of misfits and outcasts to help him achieve his dream.

name: Dragon Ball Z
desc: Goku, a powerful warrior, defends the Earth from various threats with the help of his friends. The series follows his adventures as he trains to become stronger and faces off against powerful enemies.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
desc: Ken Kaneki, a college student, is turned into a half-ghoul after a near-death experience. He struggles to adapt to his new life and faces discrimination from both humans and ghouls.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
desc: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood follows the story of two brothers, Edward and Alphonse Elric, who use alchemy to try to bring their mother back to life. However, their attempt goes horribly wrong, and Edward loses his left leg and Alphonse loses his entire body. Edward then sacrifices his right arm to bind Alphonse's soul to a suit of armor. The brothers set out on a journey to find the Philosopher's Stone, a powerful and mythical object that can restore their bodies, while also working as state alchemists for the military.

name: Sword Art Online
desc: Sword Art Online is a virtual reality massively multiplayer online role-playing game (VRMMORPG) where players can control their avatars with their minds. However, when the game is released, the players discover that they cannot log out and that if they die in the game, they die in real life. The protagonist, Kirito, is one of the players trapped in the game and must find a way to escape while also dealing with the dangers of the game.

name: Hunter x Hunter (2011)
desc: Hunter x Hunter follows the story of Gon Freecss, a young boy who discovers that his father, who he thought was dead, is actually a legendary Hunter, a person who specializes in finding rare treasures, exploring uncharted territories, and hunting down dangerous individuals. Gon decides to become a Hunter himself and sets out on a journey to find his father and become a Hunter like him.

name: One Punch Man
desc: One Punch Man follows the story of Saitama, a superhero who can defeat any enemy with a single punch. However, he is bored with his overwhelming strength and seeks a worthy opponent. The series follows his adventures as he joins the Hero Association and fights against various monsters and villains.

name: Dragon Ball Super
desc: Dragon Ball Super is a sequel to the Dragon Ball Z series and follows the story of Goku and his friends as they face new challenges and enemies. The series introduces new transformations, such as Super Saiyan Blue, and new characters, such as Beerus, the God of Destruction, and Whis, his attendant.
